faction_profile.name: 하북팽가 (Hebei Peng Family / 河北彭家)
alias: The King of Blades (도왕 / 刀王)

location.city: Beijing (북경 / 北京) - Capital of Ming Dynasty.
location.geo_political_status: Located in the Imperial Capital. Inevitably linked with Imperial Court (Gwan-a) and politics.

faction_profile.heritage: A lineage of warlords and generals.
faction_profile.political_stance: Orthodox (Jeongpa). Often ranked #1 or #2 in the Five Families due to pure destructive power.

physique: Born with Divine Strength (신력 / Godly Strength).
Huge stature and heavy muscles (men and women alike).
Naturally tough skin and bones suitable for external arts.

combat_style.signature_weapon: Great Saber / Dao (도 / 刀) - Often exaggerated in size and weight.
combat_style.tactics: Crushing opponents with sheer force and wide-range attacks. 'Slash first, ask later'.

contradiction.description: Although portrayed as muscleheads, their location (Beijing) implies high political acumen.
contradiction.narrative_hook: Are they pretending to be ignorant to survive in the capital? Or are they truly just powerful enough to ignore politics?

list.name: 건곤미허신공 (Heaven and Earth Void Divine Art)
list.effect: Hardens skin like armor. Optimizes body for external arts.

list.name: 혼원벽력신공 (Chaos Thunderbolt Divine Art)
list.risk: Requires natural divine strength; otherwise, meridians may burst.

list: 건곤연환탈백도 (Heaven and Earth Soul Stealing Chain Saber)
오호단문도 (Five Tigers Broken Door Saber) - Foundational art.
대력금강장 (Great Strength Diamond Palm) - Immense physical force.

narrative_role: The reliable 'Tank' ally who clears minions.
A friction point with intellectual characters (like Zhuge Family).
A political buffer between the Murim Alliance and the Imperial Court.
Tragic figures who fight to the death for loyalty.
